meanings.definition: In relation to the subject matter of iconography.
meanings.sent1: The iconographically inspired paintings adorned the walls of the museum.
meanings.sent2: The artist's iconographically themed exhibition attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The iconographically decorated cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her room was iconographically styled, with religious symbols everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The iconographically designed logo left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the visual images or symbols in a particular artistic style or tradition.
meanings.sent1: She painted iconographically, capturing the essence of the era.
meanings.sent2: The mural was iconographically stunning, showcasing intricate details.
meanings.sent3: He danced iconographically, mimicking the movements of ancient figures.
meanings.sent4: The story was told iconographically, through vivid illustrations.
meanings.sent5: The film was shot iconographically, with attention to every visual detail.
